dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a benchmark for various tasks in computer vision, particularly for autonomous driving, providing stereo images, optical flow, and 3D object annotations.
dcterms:title: KITTI Dataset

dcterms:creator: Moritz Menze
Andreas Geiger
dcterms:description: KITTI Scene Flow Training provides ground truth for scene flow estimation, allowing for the evaluation of algorithms in a controlled environment.
dcterms:title: KITTI Scene Flow Training

dcterms:description: nuScenes is a multimodal dataset for autonomous driving, containing images, LiDAR, and annotations for various tasks including object detection and tracking.
dcterms:title: nuScenes Dataset

dcterms:description: Monkaa is a large dataset designed for training convolutional networks for disparity, optical flow, and scene flow estimation.

dcterms:description: DAVIS is a benchmark dataset and evaluation methodology for video object segmentation, providing high-quality annotations for various video sequences.

dcterms:description: WSVD is a dataset for web stereo video supervision, aimed at depth prediction from dynamic scenes.
